transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji. Hello.
Customer: Badhiya hu sir.
Executive: Mai ye kehna tha.
Customer: Mai ye kehna tha isme product mere bahut se reject kyu ho rahe hai. Abhi maine do product add karna chahe the dono product reject kyu ho gaye isme.
Executive: Sir ek second.
Executive: Product reject ho rahe hai. Let me check wait sir.
Executive: Okay.

Executive: Catalog khol rahi hu.

Executive: Just a second sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir ek second mai aapko call karti hu. Ek second mai aapko call karti hu sir.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know why products are rejected.



Resolution:

- Executive put the call on hold to check.
- Executive said she will call back in a second.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product rejection, catalog, call back
